Text.p: The Lakon Spaceways MC15 QuikTransport Shuttle is the most commonly encountered intermediate range shuttle, with a range of 0.1 LY and a full HiGrav Loading facility. It can carry up to 100 passengers, and has a cargo capacity of 10 tonnes undefined bulk. Can load on asteroids, space stations, and can skim atmosphere, and touch down on land surfaces and all liquid surfaces except acid.
